info.name: Benefit Eligibility SDK API Collection
info.description: API collection for Benefit Eligibility SDK endpoints.

item.name: Check Eligibility - Single User Multiple Benefits

body.raw:
{
  "userProfile": {
    "user_id": "3884735a-8ffe-4ad0-bb5c-741d010fbe34",
    "firstName": "Ankushkumar",
    "middleName": "",
    "lastName": "Maherwal",
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "phoneNumber": "9766398435",
    "dob": "1990-01-01",
    "sso_provider": "keycloak",
    "sso_id": "435020b0-99de-48ac-81eb-c617b9664854",
    "image": "",
    "fieldsVerified": "false",
    "fieldsVerifiedAt": "Mon Sep 15 2025 14:40:16 GMT+0530 (India Standard Time)",
    "fieldsVerificationData": "[object Object]",
    "walletToken": "e5003b22-dd9b-4da4-827d-2bdc319c8235",
    "created_at": "Wed Jul 16 2025 09:57:05 GMT+0530 (India Standard Time)",
    "updated_at": "Mon Sep 15 2025 14:40:16 GMT+0530 (India Standard Time)",
    "docs": "",
    "customFields": "[object Object],[object Object]",
    "fatherName": "",
    "gender": "male",
    "caste": "sc",
    "annualIncome": "400000",
    "disabilityStatus": "",
    "aadhaar": "",
    "age": "25",
    "nspOtr": "",
    "studentType": "",
    "udid": "",
    "class": "9",
    "currentSchoolName": "",
    "previousYearMarks": "75",
    "disabilityType": "",
    "disabilityRange": "",
    "bankAccountHolderName": "",
    "bankName": "",
    "branchCode": "",
    "bankAccountNumber": "",
    "bankIfscCode": "",
    "bankAddress": "",
    "tuitionAndAdminFeePaid": "",
    "miscFeePaid": "",
    "state": "Maharashtra",
    "acres": ""
  },
  "benefitsList": [
    {
      "id": 29677,
      "eligibility": [
        {
          "id": "B1",
          "type": "userProfile",
          "description": "The applicant must be from SC or ST or OBC castes",
          "criteria": {
            "name": "caste",
            "condition": "in",
            "conditionValues": ["sc", "st", "obc"]
          }
        },
        {
          "id": "B2",
          "type": "userProfile",
          "description": "The Total Annual income must not exceed ₹2.7 Lakh per Annum",
          "criteria": {
            "name": "annualIncome",
            "condition": "lte",
            "conditionValues": 270000
          }
        }
      ],
      "eligibilityEvaluationLogic": "(B1 && B2)"
    },
    {
      "id": 29682,
      "eligibility": [
        {
          "id": "C1",
          "type": "userProfile",
          "description": "Age must be between 16 and 25 years",
          "criteria": {
            "name": "age",
            "condition": "between",
            "conditionValues": [16, 25]
          }
        }
      ],
      "eligibilityEvaluationLogic": "C1"
    }
  ]
}

item.name: Check Eligibility - Multiple Users Single Benefit
